com.mpos.lottery.te.thirdpartyservice.playeraccount.service

接口 PlayerTopupService

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DefaultPlayerTopupService

    public interface PlayerTopupService

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void topup(Context respCtx, PlayerTopupDto dto)
      This service will be called once player has successfully topup account on player account system, and the client(GPE) will sync this message to TE by calling this service.

    • 方法详细资料

      • topup

        void topup(Context respCtx,
         PlayerTopupDto dto)
           throws ApplicationException
        This service will be called once player has successfully topup account on player account system, and the client(GPE) will sync this message to TE by calling this service.

        This service will,

        1. generate transaction.
        2. maintain operator's topup balance.
        3. calculate commission.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
